system.requirements:
Tier 1; None
Aptitudes: General, Offence, Unaligned
system.effect: Gain additional +10 to WS when ganging up on an opponent, if ally also has this talent, both gain additional +10, for a total of +20 on top of normal outnumbering bonuses.

description.value: Gain additional +10 to WS when ganging up on an opponent, if ally also has this talent, both gain additional +10, for a total of +20 on top of normal outnumbering bonuses.
